title: Moreish Caramel Shortbread
ingredients: ['Shortbread', '115g butter', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '125g plain flour', '35g ground almonds', 'Caramel Filling', '170g butter', '75g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 (397g) tin sweetened condensed milk', 'Topping', '225g high quality milk chocolate', '45g toasted flaked almonds']
